title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: LCD of  fraction, m plus 11, over, m squared minus 5 m plus 4,  , , fraction, 5 over, m minus 4,  , and , fraction, 3 over, m minus 1,   is  parentheses m minus 4,  times, parentheses m minus 1,  .
pacedSpeech: LCD of   fraction, m plus 11, over, m squared minus 5 m plus 4,
is    m minus 4,  times,  m minus 1,

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$m+11=5(m-1)-3(m-4)$$
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  m plus 11, is equal to 5 times, parentheses m minus 1,  minus, 3 times, parentheses m minus 4,
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get   m plus 11, is equal to 5 times,  m minus 1,  minus, 3 times,  m minus 4,

title: Simplify the Equation
text: Let's simplify this equation: $$m+11=5m-5-3m+12$$. This simplifies to $$m=4$$.
speech: Let's simplify this equation:  m plus 11, is equal to 5 m minus 5 minus 3 m plus 12 . This simplifies to  m is equal to 4 .
pacedSpeech: Let's simplify this equation:   m plus 11, is equal to 5 m minus 5 minus 3 m plus 12
. This simplifies to   m is equal to 4

title: Solve the Equation
text: $$m=4$$ is our equation. $$4$$ is extraneous, however, since it is in the denominator of the original equation. DNE.
speech: , m is equal to 4  is our equation.  4  is extraneous, however, since it is in the denominator of the original equation. DNE.
